name: Infinity Unlocked
description:
A scientist stole a time machine which allows him to see and interact with his own past self. Using the stolen device, the scientific has to escape the facility and uncover the truth.

Make sure to make it until the end for an awesome ending ;)

Camile Cazot Lead designer, Tech arstist and programmer

Federico Mello Programmer, Producer and designer

Gustavo Haro Pixel artist

Angelo Priore: Sound designer and composer
